mapper.select: select category from category where category = #{category}
select category_id from category where category = #{category}
select count(category_id) as categoryId from userscategory where category_id=#{categoryId} and id=#{id}
select password from users where id=#{value}
select c.category_id from category c, userscategory uc where uc.category_id = c.category_id and c.category=#{category} and id = #{id}
mapper.update: update userscategory set money_limit=#{limit} where category_id=#{categoryId}
mapper.select: select c.category as category, uc.money_limit as limit from category c, userscategory uc where c.category = #{category} and id = #{id} and uc.category_id = c.category_id
select DISTINCT a.category_id as categoryId, a.category , b.operations from category a , userscategory b where a.category_id = b.category_id and b.category_id=#{categoryId}
select category_id as postCount from category where category = #{category}
mapper.update: update userscategory set category_id = #{postCount}, operations = #{operations} where id = #{id} and category_id = #{categoryId}
mapper.select: select category.category, count(list.category) as postCount, category.category_id as categoryId, userscategory.money_limit as limit from users left outer join userscategory on users.id=userscategory.id and users.id=#{id} left outer join category on userscategory.category_id=category.category_id left outer join list on (category.category = list.category) and list.id = #{id} where category.category is not NULL group by category.category, category.category_id, userscategory.money_limit order by category.category

select category.category, count(list.category) as postCount, category.category_id as categoryId, userscategory.money_limit as limit from users left outer join userscategory on users.id=userscategory.id and users.id=#{id} left outer join category on userscategory.category_id=category.category_id left outer join list on (category.category = list.category) and list.id = #{id} where category.category is not NULL and userscategory.operations = '+' group by category.category, category.category_id, userscategory.money_limit order by category.category

select category.category, count(list.category) as postCount, category.category_id as categoryId, userscategory.money_limit as limit from users left outer join userscategory on users.id=userscategory.id and users.id=#{id} left outer join category on userscategory.category_id=category.category_id left outer join list on (category.category = list.category) and list.id = #{id} where category.category is not NULL and userscategory.operations = '-' group by category.category, category.category_id, userscategory.money_limit order by category.category

select category.category, count(list.category) as postCount, category.category_id as categoryId, userscategory.money_limit as limit from users left outer join userscategory on users.id=userscategory.id and users.id=#{id} left outer join category on userscategory.category_id=category.category_id left outer join list on (category.category = list.category) and list.id = #{id} where category.category is not NULL and userscategory.operations = '0' group by category.category, category.category_id, userscategory.money_limit order by category.category

choose.when: SELECT a.category, d.LIST_ID as listId FROM category a, userscategory b, users c , list d WHERE a.CATEGORY_ID = b.CATEGORY_ID AND b.ID = c.ID and c.ID = d.ID and d.list_id = #{listId} and b.operations='-' and b.id=#{id}

SELECT a.category, d.LIST_ID as listId FROM category a, userscategory b, users c , list d WHERE a.CATEGORY_ID = b.CATEGORY_ID AND b.ID = c.ID and c.ID = d.ID and b.operations='0' and b.id=#{id} and d.list_id = #{listId}
choose.otherwise: SELECT a.category, d.LIST_ID as listId FROM category a, userscategory b, users c , list d WHERE a.CATEGORY_ID = b.CATEGORY_ID AND b.ID = c.ID and c.ID = d.ID and b.operations='+' and b.id=#{id} and d.list_id = #{listId}

mapper.insert: insert into userscategory (id, category_id, operations) values(#{id}, #{categoryId}, #{operations})
